episodes.title: False Prophets: The Cult of Tony & Susan Alamo
episodes.description:
Tony and Susan Alamo portrayed themselves as messengers of divine truth, but beneath their righteous facade, a reality of exploitation emerged. Their followers sought salvation but found themselves caught in a web of control and corruption. Tony and Susan Alamo’s ministry promised them heaven but delivered them hell. 

⚠️ You are not alone ⚠️ 
Explore our website for essential resources that empower well-being, safety, and informed choices: https://wrinkleincrime.com/#services
